item.title: Teams: Component Delivery
item.description:
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/echarts.min.js'></script>

<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/chart-generator.js'></script>






    <script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/component-delivery-gen.js'></script>

    {

    },

    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 6",

        "Stage": "1.4.3",
        "Prod": "1.0.0"
    },
    {

        "Type": "Library",
        "Status": "Planned",
        "Dev": "0.0.1",
        "CI": "N/A",
        "QA": "N/A",

    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 8",

    {

        "QA": "1.0.4",
        "Stage": "1.1.0",
        "Prod": "1.0.0"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 10",

        "CI": "N/A",

    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 11",

    },
    {

    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 13",
        "Type": "Microservice",
        "Status": "In progress",
        "Dev": "1.1.5",
        "CI": "1.1.5",
        "QA": "1.0.3",
        "Stage": "1.0.3",
        "Prod": "N/A"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 14",
        "Type": "Library",
        "Status": "Stable",
        "Dev": "1.5.1",
        "CI": "0.9.5",
        "QA": "1.0.4",
        "Stage": "1.1.0",
        "Prod": "1.0.0"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 15",
        "Type": "Microfronted",
        "Status": "In progress",
        "Dev": "1.1.0",
        "CI": "0.4.0",
        "QA": "0.5.0",
        "Stage": "1.0.0",
        "Prod": "N/A"
    }
]");
    createTable(jsonData);
</script>


<script>
    let chartsData = composeChartsData(jsonData);
    let chartsBlock = document.getElementById('generated-charts');

    for (let i = 0; i < chartsData.series.length; i++) {
        let chart = generateBarChart(
            'Metrics for ' + chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.legends[i],
            chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.series[i]
        );

        chartsBlock.appendChild(chart);
    }
</script>

item.title: Teams: Component Metrics Dashboard
item.description:
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/echarts.min.js'></script>
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/echarts.config.js'></script>
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/chart-generator.js'></script>






    <script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/component-metrics-gen.js'></script>







    






<script>
    let jsonData = JSON.parse("[
    {
        "Component": "Component 1",
        "Type": "Library",
        "Priority": "Hight",
        "Implement": "Stable",
        "Readme": "Yes",
        "API Docs": "No",
        "Source (KLOC)": "40",
        "Test (KLOC)": "25",
        "Compliance": "32",
        "Covarage (%)": "48"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 2",
        "Type": "Microservice",
        "Priority": "Medium",
        "Implement": "Planned",
        "Readme": "No",
        "API Docs": "Yes",
        "Source (KLOC)": "25",
        "Test (KLOC)": "30",
        "Compliance": "37",
        "Covarage (%)": "95"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 3",
        "Type": "Microfrontend",
        "Priority": "Hight",
        "Implement": "Stable",
        "Readme": "Yes",
        "API Docs": "No",
        "Source (KLOC)": "12",
        "Test (KLOC)": "64",
        "Compliance": "15",
        "Covarage (%)": "10"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 4",
        "Type": "Library",
        "Priority": "Low",
        "Implement": "Active",
        "Readme": "No",
        "API Docs": "No",
        "Source (KLOC)": "32",
        "Test (KLOC)": "11",
        "Compliance": "12",
        "Covarage (%)": "55"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 5",
        "Type": "Microservice",
        "Priority": "Hight",
        "Implement": "Planned",
        "Readme": "No",
        "API Docs": "Yes",
        "Source (KLOC)": "24",
        "Test (KLOC)": "18",
        "Compliance": "35",
        "Covarage (%)": "75"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 6",
        "Type": "Microfrontend",
        "Priority": "Medium",
        "Implement": "Stable",
        "Readme": "Yes",
        "API Docs": "No",
        "Source (KLOC)": "37",
        "Test (KLOC)": "20",
        "Compliance": "43",
        "Covarage (%)": "27"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 7",
        "Type": "Library",
        "Priority": "Low",
        "Implement": "Active",
        "Readme": "Yes",
        "API Docs": "Yes",
        "Source (KLOC)": "14",
        "Test (KLOC)": "7",
        "Compliance": "15",
        "Covarage (%)": "24"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 8",
        "Type": "Microservice",
        "Priority": "Hight",

        "Implement": "Planned",
        "Readme": "No",
        "API Docs": "Yes",
        "Source (KLOC)": "46",
        "Test (KLOC)": "23",
        "Compliance": "34",
        "Covarage (%)": "77"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 9",
        "Type": "Microfrontend",
        "Priority": "Medium",
        "Implement": "Stable",
        "Readme": "Yes",
        "API Docs": "No",
        "Source (KLOC)": "46",
        "Test (KLOC)": "30",
        "Compliance": "25",
        "Covarage (%)": "93"
    },
    {
        "Component": "Component 10",
        "Type": "Microfrontend",
        "Priority": "Medium",
        "Implement": "Stable",
        "Readme": "No",
        "API Docs": "Yes",
        "Source (KLOC)": "40",
        "Test (KLOC)": "8",
        "Compliance": "55",
        "Covarage (%)": "30"
    }
]");
    createTable(jsonData);
</script>


<script>
    let chartsData = composeChartsData(jsonData);
    let chartsBlock = document.getElementById('generated-charts');

    for (let i = 0; i < chartsData.series.length; i++) {
        let chart = generateBarChart(
            'Metrics for ' + chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.legends[i],
            chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.series[i]
        );

        chartsBlock.appendChild(chart);
    }
</script>

item.title: Teams: Feature Delivery
item.description:
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/echarts.min.js'></script>
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/echarts.config.js'></script>
<script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/chart-generator.js'></script>






    <script src='https://banalna.github.io/dashboards/dashboards/js/feature-delivery-gen.js'></script>







    






<script>
    let jsonData = JSON.parse("[
    {
        "Feature": "Component 1",
        "Status": "In progress",
        "Component 1": {
            "CI": "1.0.1",
            "QA": "1.0.1",
            "Stage": "N/A",
            "Prod": "N/A"
        },
        "Component 2": {
            "CI": "2.1.0",
            "QA": "2.1.0",
            "Stage": "2.0.0",
            "Prod": "2.0.0"
        },
        "Component 3": {
            "CI": "N/A",
            "QA": "N/A",
            "Stage": "N/A",
            "Prod": "N/A"
        }
    },
    {
        "Feature": "Component 2",
        "Status": "Planned",
        "Component 1": {
            "CI": "N/A",
            "QA": "N/A",
            "Stage": "N/A",
            "Prod": "N/A"
        },
        "Component 2": {
            "CI": "1.1.0",
            "QA": "1.1.0",
            "Stage": "N/A",
            "Prod": "N/A"
        },
        "Component 3": {
            "CI": "1.0.0",
            "QA": "1.0.0",
            "Stage": "N/A",
            "Prod": "N/A"
        }
    },
    {
        "Feature": "Component 3",
        "Status": "Completed",
        "Component 1": {
            "CI": "2.1.0",
            "QA": "2.1.0",
            "Stage": "3.0.0",
            "Prod": "3.0.0"
        },
        "Component 2": {
            "CI": "2.1.0",
            "QA": "2.1.0",
            "Stage": "2.0.0",
            "Prod": "2.0.0"
        },
        "Component 3": {
            "CI": "1.1.0",
            "QA": "1.1.0",
            "Stage": "2.0.0",
            "Prod": "2.0.0"
        }
    }
]");
    createTable(jsonData);
</script>


<script>
    let chartsData = composeChartsData(jsonData);
    let chartsBlock = document.getElementById('generated-charts');

    for (let i = 0; i < chartsData.series.length; i++) {
        let chart = generateBarChart(
            'Metrics for ' + chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.legends[i],
            chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.series[i]
        );

        chartsBlock.appendChild(chart);
    }
</script>

        "Dev": "7",
        "CI": "3",
        "QA": "7",
        "Stage": "10"
    }
]");
    createTable(jsonData);
</script>


<script>
    let chartsData = composeChartsData(jsonData);
    let chartsBlock = document.getElementById('generated-charts');

    for (let i = 0; i < chartsData.series.length; i++) {
        let chart = generateBarChart(
            'Metrics for ' + chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.legends[i],
            chartsData.xAxisName[i],
            chartsData.series[i]
        );

        chartsBlock.appendChild(chart);
    }
</script>

item.title: Teams: Pipeline Metrics

<script>
